title: Tunnel Virtual Network
description: Segregation of Tunnel IP Routes via Virtualized Networks to handle overlapping private IPs in your origins.

links.title: List Virtual Networks
links.description: List, search and filter an account's virtual networks

name.description: A user-friendly name chosen when the virtual network is created. Cannot be empty

is_default.description: If true, return the default virtual network only. If false, return all other virtual networks. If not provided, then consider all virtual networks.

is_deleted.description: If true, only include deleted virtual networks. If false, exclude deleted virtual networks. If not provided, all virtual networks will be included

links.title: Create Virtual Network
links.description: Add a new virtual network to the account
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/teamnet/virtual_networks" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"us-east-1-vpc","comment":"Staging VPC for data science","is_default":true}'

name.description: A user-friendly name chosen when the virtual network is created. Cannot be empty

comment.description: Optional remark describing the virtual network. Empty if none

is_default.description: Whether this virtual network is the default one for the account. This means IP Routes belong to this virtual network and Teams Clients in the account route through this virtual network, unless specified otherwise for each case.

links.title: Update Virtual Network
links.description: Update an existing virtual network in the account
links.curl:
curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/teamnet/virtual_networks/f70ff985-a4ef-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"us-east-1-vpc","comment":"Staging VPC for data science","is_default_network":true}'

name.description: A user-friendly name chosen when the virtual network is created. Cannot be empty

comment.description: Optional remark describing the virtual network. Empty if none

is_default_network.description: Whether this virtual network is the default one for the account. This means IP Routes belong to this virtual network and Teams Clients in the account route through this virtual network, unless specified otherwise for each case.

links.title: Delete Virtual Network
links.description: Delete an existing virtual network from the account

name.description: A user-friendly name chosen when the virtual network is created. Cannot be empty

is_default_network.description: Whether this virtual network is the default one for the account. This means IP Routes belong to this virtual network and Teams Clients in the account route through this virtual network, unless specified otherwise for each case.

comment.description: Optional remark describing the virtual network. Empty if none

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the virtual network was created, formatted in RFC 3339

deleted_at.description: If present, indicates that the virtual network was deleted at the given date (formatted in RFC 3339). If absent, the virtual network has not been deleted

object_definition.title: Tunnel Virtual Network
object_definition.description: Segregation of Tunnel IP Routes via Virtualized Networks to handle overlapping private IPs in your origins.
